alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 1:57AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach
